word:
Encouragement in Love and Tenderness--They heard Him in love and tenderness speak encouragingly 
                                                                           94
to the weak and afflicted. They also heard Him, in a voice of authority, rebuke the power of Satan and bid his captives go free. They listened to the words of wisdom that fell from His lips, and they were captivated; they could not lay hands on Him.--EW 160.
